name: ATALCO GRAMERCY LLC (ATLANTIC ALUMINA)
description: Alumina production for a wide array of industrial applications.
sampleDescriptions: Having alumina classified as a critical material; keeping Atalco Gramercy, the last producer of Alumina located in the United States, in business by seeking to benefit from tax credits under Inflation
